state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, make an effort to head west. With that done, move south. And then, head east. And then, move east. Next, make an attempt to venture east. Then, make an attempt to go to the east. Next, make an attempt to go north. And then, attempt to venture west. And then, make an attempt to move south. With that done, try to travel west. Next, try to head south. If you can get around to doing that, move south. Okay, and then, take a trip east. If you can finish that, go north. That done, pick up the coin from the floor of the restroom. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Laundromat =- Of every laundromat you could have shown up in, you had to walk into an usual one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Laundromat =-0/1
